name: Rollin' with my Gnomies
description:
The evil gnome-zombies want to take over the garden... it is up to you and your friendly gnomies to protect it! A roll of the dice decides how many moves everyone gets each turn. Use them wisely - to move or to attack!

❤️  Turn-based fighting
❤️ Moves available to each character based on a die rolled at the beginning of the round
❤️ Allocate available moves to proceed or to attack each turn for your characters i.e. your gnomies
❤️ Strategise based on available moves - your own as well as the enemy's
❤️ Single player (against the computer) and multiplayer modes
❤️ Story mode for beginners - make your way through increasing challenge
❤️ Custom mode for advanced players - to decide your own battlefield size, team strength and difficulty

Made in ~36 active hrs x 2 people during the  GMTK Game Jam 2022 (Theme: "Roll of Dice")!
